metadata.name: Hyundai X Meta Kongz #1
metadata.description: PONY, the iconic heritage of Hyundai Motor Company, comes together with the Meta Kongz. Hyundai X Meta Kongz NFT holders will receive a bundle of Hyundai official NFTs (a comparable amount of the minting price) when Hyundai launches an official NFT collection in May 2022. Secondary sales of Hyundai x Meta Kongz NFT will not be possible after receiving an official Hyundai NFTs.
